categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Holo" was the nickname of a human female who served as a pilot in the First Order during the New Republic Era. Holo piloted a red TIE/ba Baron Space Superiority Interceptor although she may not have been as skilled as Major Baron Elrik Vonreg. She participated in a skirmish along with other First Order TIE line craft in an area clustered with space rocks and asteroids. She wore a red First Order TIE pilot suit, had light skin, and brown hair.
